TEXT.TITLE: NYSE OPTION TRADING RIGHTS SEAT SALE
TEXT.BODY: THe New York STock Exchange said an option trading rights seat sold for 40,000 dlrs, off 5,000 dlrs from the previous sale on January 29. The Exchange said the current bid is 35,000 dlrs, the last offer is for 45,000 dlrs. Reuter
